tweets.text: the day catfished me with a nice sunrise and now it's grey bleh
@xeni Good luck, sending good energy your way!

When you mess something up in clay, you just put it in a big bucket with a bunch of other mess-ups, stir it around, and dry it, and you have more raw material to start from. Working with code is a lot like this, too.

Working with clay is a lot like working with code because you find yourself needing a certain-shaped tool and you just make it yourself out of clay and use it to create other pieces of clay and now your tools are making tools
I think I wanna take May off
they persist

Tectonic is an excellent adjective.
"INFJ are happy doing jobs that require solitude and close attention."
"They are often able to detect the emotions or intentions of another individual before the individual is aware of them."
"INFJ organizes and schedules ideas and the environment to ensure the efficient, productive pursuit of objectives."
"INFJ notices the minute distinctions that define the essence of things, then analyzes and classifies them." - Sounds right to me.
Took a Myers-Briggs personality test, reading about myself.
DJ'd Ben's party; DJ'ing is fun.
Now Colin's recording a guitar track for Given Up, which I'm really really happy with.
Recording ridiculous music.
Colin's over and chillin'.
My friend @chaosman is getting down on Twitter... follow him & and @reply him suggestions for good people to follow!
All of the books that I have in my room, by Title: http://ejfox.com/books/
is playing a little Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare. http://raptr.com/pseudoplacebo
http://twitpic.com/wwzb -
Life is just too strange.
Why is shit crashing?
Bought Delicious Library.
Watching Mythbusters with my little brother.
Set up my xbox- my gamertag is "ejfox". Anyone who wants to play some halo 3 with me is welcome to.
Heading home.
